properties.title: The Grove
properties.message: Favorite mall to walk around in on a summer day! My mom used to take us here growing up to ride the trolley.

properties.title: Westfield Century City
properties.message: I love to hang out here with friends and family! It's very close to my house so it's very convenient to shop and watch movies here.

properties.title: Westfield Topanga
properties.message: This is my favorite mall in the valley since it has so many stores and restaurants. I love coming here on the weekend!

properties.title: Beverly Center
properties.message: I love shopping here before I go to my favorite sushi restaurant since it's near by! I usually come here with my mom and sister.
